Author: Pivooooo
Title: [ANN] 📣 FAMILYPOINTS.IO | Bringing Smart Contracts to Smart Parents
Body: One of the more advanced smart contract features we are implementing concerns reviews and how they are weighted. When the ledger and the platform are mature, our smart contracts will ensure that individuals who have a track record of “positive” actions within the platform, will have an increased weighting on reviews. This is important because reviews should reflect the opinions of people who are genuine and have spent time doing their research and formulating their opinions. This will prevent good products or services from being tarnished by single reviews or by people who have not spent time building a good reputation within the platform. A number of people can start rating in the beginning! And only then use it for good purposes! How will you fight?

Author: familypoints.io
Title: [ANN] 📣 FAMILYPOINTS.IO | Bringing Smart Contracts to Smart Parents
Body: One of the more advanced smart contract features we are implementing concerns reviews and how they are weighted. When the ledger and the platform are mature, our smart contracts will ensure that individuals who have a track record of “positive” actions within the platform, will have an increased weighting on reviews. This is important because reviews should reflect the opinions of people who are genuine and have spent time doing their research and formulating their opinions. This will prevent good products or services from being tarnished by single reviews or by people who have not spent time building a good reputation within the platform.  Positive actions include buying products and services, leaving photos, videos, reviews, ratings, and upvoting others. Users who actually use the platform to its maximum extent and contribute to the betterment of society can potentially become influencers within FamilyPoints.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] 📣 FAMILYPOINTS.IO | Bringing Smart Contracts to Smart Parents
Body: Former Alibaba Senior Manager Revolutionizes Parenting Through Blockchain  Shaoming Yang, who used to work for Alibaba, has joined Babystep and will now be chief business development officer for the Chinese startup that provides the most expansive library of educational video content to parents in 8 languages.  Furthermore, Yang will be handling the e-commerce side on both Babystep as well as FamilyPoints, the very first blockchain platform of its kind. Yang will also form strategic partnership to benefit both FamilyPoints and BabyStep.  FamilyPoints is pivoting itself to revolutionize the global $6 trillion market, creating a community and channel where parenting products and services can be rated and reviewed. FamilyPoints aims to prevent manufactures and service provers from being able to mislead consumers as easily, by establishing trust in a way that is immutable and verified.  To develop the platform, as well as market and expand the platform into key markets once it’s up and running, FamilyPoints will be issuing FamilyPoints Tokens (FPT), which will be used to pay the subscription fees associated with accessing the platform.  https://coinidol.com/former-alibaba-senior-manager-revolutionizes-parenting-through-blockchain/

Author: familypoints.io
Title: [ANN] 📣 FAMILYPOINTS.IO | Bringing Smart Contracts to Smart Parents
Body: Hi, thanks for the attention to FamilyPoints. Regarding your questions - We actively encourage parents to post feedback about the products and services that are offered on FamilyPoints. Other users can then upvote helpful reviews with reward points. Not only does this create a sense of community, but it also lets honest reviews do the marketing than paid promotions. Most of the families (68%) who don't shop online because of fake products and fake reviews.  Quote Stunning graphics, but I'm not sure what it actually is you are going to do.  Try to explain it to me with 5 words. Thanks, there are a little bit more words: A blockchain-based platform where parents get rewards from purchases of Baby and Maternity products and spend them on child services. The FamilyPoints platform will make parenting cheaper and education more accessible.

Author: familypoints.io
Title: [ANN] 📣 FAMILYPOINTS.IO | Bringing Smart Contracts to Smart Parents
Body: Ex-Alibaba Senior Manager Joins China-Based FamilyPoints in November  HONG KONG, November 23, 2017 (Newswire.com) - Shaoming Yang, a former senior manager at Alibaba, has joined Babystep as the chief business development officer to create a revolutionary parenting experience.  Read more: https://www.newswire.com/news/ex-alibaba-senior-manager-joins-china-based-familypoints-in-november-20073095  #familypoints #blockchain  https://www.newswire.com/files/d9/f1/3523aab222a22e054a535373ca83.png

Author: familypoints.io
Title: [ANN] 📣 FAMILYPOINTS.IO | Bringing Smart Contracts to Smart Parents
Body: https://i.imgur.com/m0R2Si3.jpg   It Takes a Village: Parenting on the Blockchain  Blockchain technology has a solution for many spheres of life, as well as for parenting industry. In the area of baby and child products, a group of family-focused business entrepreneurs has put together a trust blockchain-based platform called FamilyPoints. Parents can share real honest reviews about services and use discounts on products through this platform.  Find more information on this subject here Join our Telegram community to stay in touch with Family Points!

Author: familypoints.io
Title: [ANN] 📣 FAMILYPOINTS.IO | Bringing Smart Contracts to Smart Parents
Body: Hello. All educational services are available for purchase in the FamilyPoints platform by using fiat currency and/or reward points.  The token is designed to be used to pay for the FP`s subscription fee. As soon as it is paid (transferred from user`s account address to FP`s address, the token will be burned (destroyed), meaning, the number of tokens will decrease.
